Hello all-

Josh Auerbach just pointed out that the Avida/HyperNEAT story got linked to
on Slashdot. 

Also fun is the story it got paired with, a neuroevolutionary approach to
evolving teams of soccer players. It has a fun video to watch. I have not
yet looked at the tech under the hood, but it seems like a direct encoding
with staged evolution.

Here is the slashdot link:

http://bit.ly/a6grJB


Best regards,
Jeff Clune

Digital Evolution Lab, Michigan State University
jclune@...
www.msu.edu/~jclune
